website_summaries.verdict: This is a three-piece set of good quality, and the handles are ergonomically designed for user comfort.
pros: Design protects the hand and wrist during repetitive motion
Easy to store thanks to hanging holes
cons: The tools may bend with excessive force

customer_reviews.title: Very tough tools
customer_reviews.text: I have found these tools to be very tough. I use them for work around tree roots when i need to repair water lines or work on power wire. Other tools i have used have bent after only a couple of uses. I have really worked these tools hard. Yes i know they are garden tools but they are the best things to use when you cant use larger tools to find and fix a problem near a tree.
customer_reviews.author: Richard P. Ashwood Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Solid tools easy to find and built to last
customer_reviews.text: Been using these for a couple weeks now for tomato planting, lemon tree, basil, peppermint, sweet peppers and weeding weeds so far. I like the butt ends are a bright orange so they’re easy to find when left in the garden. These are a solid plastic mold around the solid steel shovel, and digging prongs. Metal is thick and solid, does not flex when digging or prying. The narrow shovel is great for weeding and also has measuring marks engraved into the metal.
customer_reviews.author: S. Truong

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy set
customer_reviews.text: This is a 3 piece set perfect for a any gardener. The pruning scissor is sharp. The other two, the trowel and shovel, were perfect to start our small home garden. The trowel helped dig to break up soil and make planting easier. We were able to dig holes as deep as we needed. We were also able to easily shovel the dirt in order to plant our seeds. It was a longer and we are finally able to start our garden. These tools are sturdy and will last a long time. They are also safe enough to be used by my children.
customer_reviews.author: Tucker

customer_reviews.title: Essential for Crazy Plant People
customer_reviews.text: I’ve just started my journey as a crazy plant lady, and needed the tools to look the part. These tools are affordable, but also sturdy. I’m not worrying about the handles coming unglued or hurting my hands as I use them.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay W.

customer_reviews.title: Very Durable Garden Set
customer_reviews.text: These tools, when they arrived were very sturdy and seemed well built. It's got pretty good looking stainless steel heads running about 2mm thick. I've wacked these against the ground and cement while gardening and they have not budged, cracked, bent, or loosened in the grip. Overall the quality is great for the price and they should last for years as long as you take care of them and put them away properly.
customer_reviews.author: Amarah

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and comfortable to use
customer_reviews.text: These tools were all I had hoped they would be...great grip, good size, and very sturdy feel. I have been reporting old plants and planting new ones, and these have easily dug through compacted roots and soil to allow me to divide and replant. The trowels are a great size...not the little dollhouse garden tools that easily break or hold only a small amount of soil. The grips are padded and very comfortable even for hours of gardening. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Beth M

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Small Gardening Around The House
customer_reviews.text: This 3 piece garden tool set is constructed of rustproof aluminum with rubberized grips. Of the three tools, I found the transplant trowel was the most useful. With its sleek, long design, it was great for weeding around peony plants where attention to newly forming buds was necessary and around roses to avoid thorns. They have handy hook holes so you can hang them up in your gardening shed so they are available when needed.
customer_reviews.author: MBA Guru

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product and quality!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product!!!! I have used it to garden the past few weeks and it’s very easy to use, comfortable and sturdy. It’s also stainless steel, so it won’t bend, cleans easy, and stays clean!!! I’d definitely recommend anyone to buy.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Katz

customer_reviews.title: Nice Set...Great deal
customer_reviews.text: Worked as expected. This is a pretty good deal for the three piece set. I have only used the two digging shovels, but the rake will be useful in the future. My favourite shovel is the narrow sharp piece. The sharp shovel digs through my rocky, dry, Arizona backyard easily. This garden set has a rubber section over a hard plastic handle. The stainless parts of this set are excellent. The set has large holes in the handles, which allows for hanging on my Gladiator hooks in the garage. Glad I purchased this Set, and price is right.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Sayers

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my man as he loves to garden. Our old ones were a different brand and were falling apart. These look and feel very solid. You can tell they’re made with quality materials. The metal is very hard and sturdy, and the handles feel like they’ll stay put, unlike the other brands I’ve tried.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: great tools
customer_reviews.text: Nice ergonomic design. Until they break which seems very unlikely I'll call them very robust. Good value. If lost or stolen I would buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: TCG

customer_reviews.title: Great Price for High Quality Tools
customer_reviews.text: I almost purchased some new gardening tools at Home Depot or Lowe's, and I am so glad I didn't! I would have paid 3x what these cost for a similar product at these stores. We planted 10 tomato and pepper plants in 5-gallon buckets as well as a new herb garden this year, and the tools worked great. They are sturdy and durable, and I can see them lasting for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Byrdwoman

customer_reviews.title: The tools show really nice welds and grinds which I was surprised for the ...
customer_reviews.text: The tools show really nice welds and grinds which I was surprised for the price. Heavy duty but lightweight. You can literally abuse these tools and they will last. Prying rocks out of the soil and these tools show no damage.
customer_reviews.author: Late reviewer

customer_reviews.title: These worked great for me
customer_reviews.text: I had to repair a waterline 3 feet down right between a brick wall and a huge tree. These were small enough to get into the nooks that I needed and strong enough to pry out dirt that was 40% rocks. Even stabbed a few tree roots out of my way without issue. Totally satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: DAZEDandCONFUSED

customer_reviews.title: One broke after 10 months. Not sure why.
customer_reviews.text: Edit: Less than 1 year later, the skinny shovel is coming apart. Totally unusable. The other tools are holding up. Similar usage of the shovels. I'm contacting the Tacklife company to see if they will warranty it. They say they have 2 year warranty. I contacted them, with invoice and picture April 25, and they got back June 7. They said they would refund $8. Haven't seen it yet, but I will look. I just want a good trowel. I chose these for my mother's day gift. They are very handy.
customer_reviews.author: Tellme Truth

customer_reviews.title: These are a great addition to our gardening tools
customer_reviews.text: These are a great addition to our gardening tools. We've used them a lot since we got them. I like the plastic nubs that protect the pointed tips on the hand rake. These look nice and sturdy and should last many seasons.
customer_reviews.author: DB

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy, heavy quality. Took a long time to arrive because of COVID, but was worth the wait.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Duncan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: I gave this as a gift to a friend who has a lot of planters and who thought - mistakenly - that one didn't need proper tools if one didn't have a "proper garden". Having this well-made and very comfortable set of tools has convinced her otherwise!
customer_reviews.author: Richard Middleton

customer_reviews.title: Best shovel ever
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set because it had a 5 star rating, I love this set because it is the best garden set I have ever had. The shovel glides through the dirt like a hot knife through butter. I also ordered this set because I couldn’t find my other shovels. Of course the day I placed the order I found my old shovels. This shovel and it’s friends are to go tos the old shovels are in the shed!
customer_reviews.author: Gwynn Stancil

customer_reviews.title: Solid tools - holing up well to harsh use
customer_reviews.text: I've had these for a few months now. I am doing a lot of outside projects and these tools are holding up well.
customer_reviews.author: Logan E.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Beginners
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know anything about gardening, so these were a perfect starting place for me to plant some plants and break up roots, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Snapped in half!
customer_reviews.text: Im so disappointed.....one of the shovels broke off....just snapped right off digging up a stubborn weed.....I was hoping to love these.
customer_reviews.author: SARAH BACK

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and heavy duty gardening tools
customer_reviews.text: These gardening tools are way sturdier than I expected. Heavy gauge steel, solid welds, durable handles. I have no complaints, especially for the price. If there's any "con" it's that they're a bit utilitarian looking, but that's not necessarily a bad thing.
customer_reviews.author: Mike D.

customer_reviews.title: Well Worth The Buy
customer_reviews.text: The stainless steel design holds up to wet conditions as well as to me applying a lot of force/leverage when removing strong roots. The orange color highlight is brighter than expected. It’s a safety-orange.
customer_reviews.author: Rosanna Borden

customer_reviews.title: good fit for ladies
customer_reviews.text: this was perfect for me to do some light gardening of annuals around the side of the house. the tools were comfortable for my small hands and the tools were just the right weight to dig and pull up roots. easy to wipe down and put away
customer_reviews.author: Skipro56

customer_reviews.title: sturdy and useful set for gardening
customer_reviews.text: My husband likes them, purchased to support his covid-19 gardening adventures. Useful and no-nonsense set for a man who would not be interested in a "carrying case," etc. By the way, they are comfortable in my hands too.
customer_reviews.author: Dvora

customer_reviews.title: The best gardening set
customer_reviews.text: It is the best garden set I ever had. It made from heavy duty steel. I use for few months, there are not any signs of rust. Handle sturdy and easy to grip. Orange parts make it easy to find on the ground.
customer_reviews.author: J. Balametov

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: Tried many different styles and seemed to always find them too flimsy. These are not at all flimsy, they are quite sturdy and have held up very well to all the abuse we could dish out. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: JDC

customer_reviews.title: Good tools and price
customer_reviews.text: We got a chance to test out all our tools in the garage this spring when we took up gardening. Many didn’t make it. I ordered these for Father’s Day and they’re still going strong!
customer_reviews.author: Lynne Dorner

customer_reviews.title: Impressive
customer_reviews.text: Some of the best yard tools I have ever had. Very well built and comfortable to use. Easy to clean off even after being in the dirt all day. Definitely recommend - great tools for the money
customer_reviews.author: cinderella0331

customer_reviews.title: Good garden tools
customer_reviews.text: This is a good set of tools at a reasonable price, and I enjoy using them very much. I've used for a couple weeks, and they appear durable and economic.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Durable, great quality.
customer_reviews.text: I am a newbie quarantine gardener so I wasn't sure what tools I'd need. These are amazing. I've used them a lot and they're incredibly durable. Super impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: I really like my new gardening tools. My 5 year old was even able to use them without a problem. They seem very sturdy and durable. They look very well made.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Well made sturdy solid
customer_reviews.text: Very well built, sturdy. Great trip on the handles. Shovel does not nend one biglt, solid construction. I gifted these to my wife for her gardening.
customer_reviews.author: nick d

customer_reviews.title: Good price and gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: I’m very happy with the quality of these tools. I was unimpressed with the selection at my local home improvement stores and opted to try these instead. I’ve used the two trowels several times and they’ve done a good job digging up plants and replanting flowers. I hose them off when I’m done to keep them looking nice.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: It's stronger than dirt!!!
customer_reviews.text: It's nice to garden with tools that do the job without major problems, like not doing the job. Sturdy and nicely patterned to fit your grip.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Casale

customer_reviews.title: Great Tools
customer_reviews.text: These guys were just what I needed when my hand rake weld broke. Great replacement and I got two different shovels as a bonus. I would buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: SM

customer_reviews.title: Good value set
customer_reviews.text: Good set for the value! I purchased this set because my spade broke. Everything has held up on the summer so far! Comfortable handles.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Moran

customer_reviews.title: Not a thing to complain about.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. If you are looking for durable garden tools for a reasonable price this is it. Comfortable to use and should last a lifetime.
customer_reviews.author: brandon white

customer_reviews.title: Great Set of Garden Tools
customer_reviews.text: This is a great set of garden tools. I’ve used them several times already for potting plants as well as in bigger raised beds and I’m quite pleased with them. They are very comfortable to use, good quality, and seem like they will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: The Spooky Vegan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent tools
customer_reviews.text: Excellent tools. Solidly made. Glad I read reviews and followed advice to buy this set. U will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: happy

customer_reviews.title: Best garden tools that I have ever purchased
customer_reviews.text: These are so much better than any store bought ones that I have purchased in the past. Very durable and bigger than expected. Love them.
customer_reviews.author: Eddiedowney

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: Smaller size for someone like me that lives in a gated community and only deals with potted plants
customer_reviews.author: Boysen

customer_reviews.title: Holds up nicely!
customer_reviews.text: I've put these tools through the ringer the past few months with gardening and yard work. They've held up very well! Nice grip handle and no chips in the metal after multiple uses. Would recommend to any home owner!
customer_reviews.author: SyuraRae

customer_reviews.title: Works Well
customer_reviews.text: Sturdiness may become an issue over time, but for the value trade off it may be worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Coal

customer_reviews.title: Best tools I've used in my garden
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set to work in my garden to dig up deep roots and weeds. They do not bend and are very sturdy. I love to use them while gardening and highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Kincaid

customer_reviews.title: Good, Basic Garden Set
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy set of gardening tools without being too heavy. Seemed to perform well despite my clay soil.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality shovels!
customer_reviews.text: For a great price too. I probably won’t use the rake but the two shovels are wonderful.

customer_reviews.title: this is very useful tool for gardening
customer_reviews.text: this is very useful tool for gardening. I also use it for clamming in the beach. the life guard won't let us because we have large shavel. so I decide to get a small set of gardening tool this time. we have so much fun.

customer_reviews.title: Decent garden tools
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because the handles broke off my prior set. I hope these last longer. So far they seem ok.

customer_reviews.text: Garden tools look good, feels comfortable and easy to use. Made with heavy duty metal

customer_reviews.text: Pretty good set of garden tools. Has held up to some extreme use this spring and summer in our garden. Would buy again for sure!

customer_reviews.title: Easy gardening tools
customer_reviews.text: These garden tools are versatile and easy to use. Good staples for use outdoors and should last a long time.

customer_reviews.title: Works awesome
customer_reviews.text: Looks great and smooth. For small tools it works great, even on hard soil.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin M

customer_reviews.title: Built well
customer_reviews.text: These things are built well. Sometimes you go to the garden center and find garden tools you can bend by hand. These aren't them. And they're quite a bit cheaper and sturdier than something you'll buy at lowes or home depot of seemingly lesser quality.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie G.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy tool set
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to replace two inexpensive garden trowels, one I bent and the other I broke (it was hard plastic, rookie mistake). These fit the bill--sturdy, will not bend with pressure, and stainless steel to avoid rusting. My favorite of the trio is the trowel with depth measurements engraved in to make planting at the right depth easier. I'm pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Casual gardener

customer_reviews.title: Solid value
customer_reviews.text: No complaints with this, it works great. Doesn’t seem like it’s made of cheap material anything. Would definitely say it’s sturdy and a solid value.
customer_reviews.author: Richie Rich

customer_reviews.title: Good set of garden tools
customer_reviews.text: It is well built and made of stainless steel, which makes them extra resilient, as opposed to others made of aluminum.

customer_reviews.title: The hold up very well.
customer_reviews.text: I had been looking for a set just like this for awhile glad I found them

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy tools!
customer_reviews.text: We have been gardening with our tools purchased from discount stores. They don’t last long until we have to replace them. So, we decided to splurge on a more expensive gardening tool set. We are more than pleased with the quality of these. I can see us using these for a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I did quite a bit of digging and thus set did not bend at all. I dug up two grass plants and planted a rock garden and also planted quite a bit of flowering plants at a commercial site with these tools. Worked very well. Makes a great gift for a gardener!

customer_reviews.title: Great set!
customer_reviews.text: Great set for a great price - very good sturdy quality and meets my gardening needs!

customer_reviews.title: Nice garden tool set

customer_reviews.title: Good!
customer_reviews.text: Gifted to my mother because she gardens regularly. I think she’s enjoyed it or at least that’s what she tells me. Seemed sturdy enough for light gardening.

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: I used it for my compost and indoor garden. I really like how sturdy it is.

product_meta.title: TACKLIFE Garden Tool Set, 3 Piece Stainless Steel Heavy Duty Gardening Kit with Soft Rubberized Non-Slip Handle - Trowel, Transplant Trowel and Cultivator Hand Rake - Garden Gifts for Parents GGT1A
feature_bullets: Larger size & higher efficiency: The tool size is longer than conventional ones and is thicker - 1.5mm/ 0.06inch, which can improve efficiency. Ideal for kinds of gardening tasks like weeding, digging, transplanting, pruning, loosening the soil and more.

More durable material: Your garden tools set are made of high quality polished stainless steel, which is easy to clean and more sturdy, do not bent, durable and lasting repel-pesticides anti-corrosion.

Ergonomic design: The profile of non-slip grip is comfortable, designed to reduce stress on wrist and hand. The scientific size of handle provides excellent grip and comfort to reduce hand fatigue. Practical hanging holes design makes storage easier.

Unique design: The tip design of rake is more conducive to loose soil which will break up the larger clumps of dirt. The length grading mark of transplant trowel let you know the right depth for the plants, which is more convenient to transplant plants.
What you get: 1x TACKLIFE GGT1A 3 Piece Garden Kit, 1x User Manual. Trowel: 13*3.5*1.7 inch. Transplant spade: 13*2.8*1.8 inch. Rake: 11*3.5*2.8 inch.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars349 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
